price: 56 Ils ne connaîtront plus jamais la mort et seront préservés des tourments du Brasier
arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā al-mawta illā al-mawtata al-ūlā wawaqāhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
